Articles.Content:
panfish, your Jolly Roger isn't so jolly...

In a textbook pass Jiji shot one ASM, which tore off the lower plating, and then went in for the kill with two AFMs.

PERSIST

http://www./?d44lxvmj74vxdub

@ panfish There is some weird stuff going on in this persist.

One of my fighters is missing (either 3 or 5, you didn't say which one you killed) and one of your ships spontaneously exploded (jb2) when I loaded my remaining ship:

I tried reloading the persist but my ship is still missing (sadly jb2 didn't explode this time), if you could let me know which one you killed ill replace the missing one with one with an identical amount of ammo (unless you have an unbroken version of the persist?)

I shot down number 4 and i dont have a good persist just replace you lost ship.

There is nothing wrong with it just needs some adjustment rather than starting from scratch.

It's wrong in all the ways that it was modified from the Nautilus' base hull. Everything I "improved" about it wound up being a problem, so I rebuilt from scratch this time instead of using the Nautilus as a base.

Edited November 10, 2013 by daemonCaptrix

It's wrong in all the ways that it was modified from the Nautilus' base hull. Everything I "improved" about it wound up being a problem, so I rebuilt from scratch this time instead of using the Nautilus as a base.

yeah using ships as bases are hard. Most of my rebuilds are from scratch, but copying the old ship.

yeah using ships as bases are hard. Most of my rebuilds are from scratch, but copying the old ship.

I think this will be an improvement over the original Nautilus as well, since very few parts clip through each other now.

Ok, I hyperedited a replacement next to the wreck of Hf1 and then used Hf4 (thought you said it was this one you shot) to take out jb2 leaving us with 2 ships left each:

File: http://www./view/eejx4m43gmbt64d/persistent(9).sfs

lol

It seems no one is interested in my tl;dr challenge.
Well, I don't have any ground or air based designs, I cold join as the spaceforce for a team but i have no interest in developing planet based forces.

Well, I don't have any ground or air based designs, I cold join as the spaceforce for a team but i have no interest in developing planet based forces.

So when the Orks attack, your colonies will be toast. WAAAGH!

Edit:

Also I am afraid to face you in space. ._. lol

Edited November 10, 2013 by daemonCaptrix

lol

It seems no one is interested in my tl;dr challenge.

Oh why not... I'll take up your challenge, but it'll take me a couple days to raise an airforce (im terrible at building planes), army, put ships into space, and put a base somewhere. Mostly because i'm going to want to do it all without hyperedit so i actually have to drive/fly everything there

Edited November 10, 2013 by BrightBritches
Bright Britches since the UKSC is now a Subsidiary you can use all Arcadia Industries aircraft for Personal and Public use, Just give credit

So who wants to do a large-scale conflict?

Location: Kerbin System (Kerbin, Mun, Minmus)

Maximum Mass: 1100 t

Space Vehicles: 5 @ max 440 t

Atmospheric Vehicles: 5 @ max 440 t

Space-Bases: 1 @ max 200 t

Ground-Bases: 1 @ max 200 t

and doesnt this add up to more that 1100 tons?

Bright Britches since the UKSC is now a Subsidiary you can use all Arcadia Industries aircraft for Personal and Public use, Just give credit

Well thanks for that info! lol i'll go take a look at what you guys have and see if theres anything i like
May I Suggest the FB-2 Falcon, It's a very stable and decently fast plane.

and doesnt this add up to more that 1100 tons?

Yes it does. It allows the player to choose where they want to put the extra tonnage. All-together, your forces should be no more than 1100 t.

Edit:

It's okay to take a couple days first. I expected that few people would already have space, land, air vehicles and military bases.

Yes it does. It allows the player to choose where they want to put the extra tonnage. All-together, your forces should be no more than 1100 t.

Edit:

It's okay to take a couple days first. I expected that few people would already have space, land, air vehicles and military bases.

Ohhhhhhh okay i get it now, was just confused i guess.

I mean i have some stuff for land and air drafted up, but never really completed designing.

Is it okay if i set up first? probably only gonna go a few km from KSC so i'm not driving for hours on end O_o

and im assuming we just put our forces around our base or something?

Ohhhhhhh okay i get it now, was just confused i guess.

I mean i have some stuff for land and air drafted up, but never really completed designing.

Is it okay if i set up first? probably only gonna go a few km from KSC so i'm not driving for hours on end O_o

and im assuming we just put our forces around our base or something?

I knew I forgot something.

-When you set up, place a flag somewhere near a coastline.

-Place ships and bases within 50k of the flag.

-If, at the beginning of a turn, any vehicle is on the surface of Kerbin outside of 50k from the flag, that vehicle is disabled.

Edited November 10, 2013 by daemonCaptrix

It was a perfect shot, cant deny that, pretty much the only place you can 1 hit that ship. Fancy a rematch? I've got 3 ships setup at Vall: http://www./?rebey40ndsntvcg

Its 680, and 2 370 parters placed a few km apart.

Edit: craft file in the post.

sorry, but I tried it twice already and the lag is simply too much to actually play on...

we could try 2on2 corvette combat though

Edited November 10, 2013 by Spearka

Alright finally got my turn done.

I am pretty sure that I killed that drek because I destroyed the capsule and the original power module and when I inspected the ship the only powered core I could find was from missiles.

Edited November 11, 2013 by panfish5

sorry, but I tried it twice already and the lag is simply too much to actually play on...

we could try 2on2 corvette combat though

ok, just delete the battleship from that last persist

Forgot to mention my Fighter is complete. It's called the Destructor Mk I, and it fires the Odin's Dart Half-Meter Missile...Carries 7 or 8. I wouldn't piss it off.

Edited November 11, 2013 by FallingIntoBlack
Shame about the lag really, I made some improvements to the Dominator and wanted to try it 3v1 again.
Mr Tegu My anti everything missiles are missing did you shoot them off or did quicksave stuff happen? Can I spawn back new missiles?
You ran out of em, I deliberately targeted the ships that hadn't fired yet, you've shot 3, I destroyed the other 2 when i took out their fighters.
Oh... well time to pop some engines.
